hero.focusText: . Which means I focus on creating beautiful layouts and functional systems.

cvx.description: Transforms generic resumes into surgical ones. Analyzes fit, identifies skill gaps, and optimizes text with AI for specific job openings.

recall.description: Spaced repetition platform. Automates card creation and schedules reviews based on the forgetting curve for languages.

zenvya.description: Physical evolution hub with AI. Personalized training and diet plans that adapt to the user's routine and progress in real-time.

uberFoodtruck.description: Backend technical challenge solved as a senior profile. Locates the nearest food trucks by calculating geolocation in real-time.

ExperiencePage.title: Experience
ExperiencePage.subtitle: My professional journey and the impact I've made through technology and lots of dedication.

descriptions: End-to-end development of Deep Agent for automotive market analysis, built with frontend, backend, AWS Lambda and Bedrock, with multi-skills architecture and tools for quantitative (Pandas) and textual analysis of surveys and verbatims.
Created AI pipeline to automatically document +2,000 Salesforce Apex classes, generating Markdown documentation via LLM and resolving the absence of technical documentation.
Created knowledge base with AI from support tickets of 37 services, processing +2 million lines of data in 2 weeks.
Technical role in SFA Automation and myHonda 2.0 projects, platform responsible for the complete management of the sales cycle at dealerships.
Interface between management, architecture, consultancies and squads, supporting technical decisions, integrations via API Gateway (Sensedia) and ticket tracking between areas.
Support for specific business areas, handling everything from production incidents reported by users to strategic improvement projects defined by executive leadership.
Direct collaboration with Business Analysts of Core Systems (Oracle R12).
Support in sending marketing materials and monitoring inventory control.
Registration of new customers, contributing to the quality of customer service and relationship with PPG representatives, customers and suppliers.
Focal point for product complaints, aiming for quick and effective resolution of occurrences.
Directing safety data sheets (SDS) related to the refinish segment, ensuring compliance with applicable standards.
